product_name: Mountain Hardwear Effusion Power Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: If you run even in damp, windy weather, zip on the women's Mountain Hardwear Effusion Power Jacket. It's crafted with the perfect combination of windproof and breathable stretch panels. Windproof and water-resistant main body fabric blocks weather where it hits most. Super-breathable stretch panels are strategically placed to dissipate perspiration and excess heat. Durable water repellent finish beads up precipitation so it rolls off. Water-resistant zippered chest pocket holds a media player and small items. Thumb loops in knit cuffs increase hand coverage for warmth. Reflective trim on the Mountain Hardwear Effusion Power Jacket increases your visibility in low light. Dual hem-drawcords allow quick fit adjustments on the fly. Closeout.
short_description: If you run even in damp, windy weather, zip on the women's Mountain Hardwear Effusion Power Jacket. It's crafted with the perfect combination of windproof and breathable stretch panels.
